steps.description: Build the test environment according to the topology diagram;
Tester port1 IP address is 192.168.1.100/24, port2 is 192.168.2.100/24;
DUT port1 IP address is 192.168.1.1/24, port2 IP address is 192.168.2.1/24;
Configure DUT and tester in the same Area, DUT interfaces 1 and 2 establish OSPF adjacency with tester respectively;
Tester interfaces port1 and port2 respectively send Type LSA to DUT interfaces port1 and port2, with a total number equal to the specified value of the DUT routing table capacity.
steps.expected_result: View and record the OSPF-generated routing table statistics information of the DUT.

comments.id: Unique identifier for the test case.
comments.title: Title of the test case, briefly describing the test content.
comments.objective: Purpose of the test, indicating the function or feature to be verified by this test case.
comments.test_reference: Reference documents for the test case, such as RFC section numbers, etc.
comments.steps: Detailed description of test steps. Each step includes: step_id: unique identifier for the step. description: specific operation or configuration for the step. expected_result: expected result for the step.
comments.tags: Tags for the test case, used for classification or filtering. Types include: ['function', 'performance']
